name: Happyr API Client
author: Tobias Nyholm

sections.description: The plugin is a wordpress wrapper for the PHP API client for HappyRecruiting. It uses the composer.phar to get the libraries that we depend on. Everything is included, you just need to press the install button on the plugin’s admin page.
sections.installation:
This is some brief installation notes.

  1. Upload the plugin source to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Install the vendors by clicking ‘Install vendors’ on the pluigns admin page
  4. Add you API credentials on the admin page.
sections.faq: If you got any questions or just which to retrieve the API credentials. Please contact us on Happy Recruiting.

short_description: This is the Happyr API client. This plugin helps you to integrate the PHP library with Wordpress.
description: The plugin is a wordpress wrapper for the PHP API client for HappyRecruiting. It uses the composer.phar to get the libraries that we depend on. Everything is included, you just need to press the install button on the plugin’s admin page.
